Name: GonzoVR
About the game: Daily 3D 360 Studio Broadcast at 6 pm PST! GonzoVR is a real-world live VR social hangout app where you can watch and chat in real time with streamers and other viewers during scheduled broadcasts, collaboratively control a VR camera on an RC car, and interact with elements of the real world, including a really cool dog named Gonzo. There are two kinds of broadcast: 3D 360 Studio Broadcasts : daily live streams with cool hosts Watch live scheduled broadcasts in 3D 360 VR with live streamers from our studio Speak voice to voice to the broadcaster and other viewers as an avatar or in chat Interact with arduino bots Watch videos of archived broadcasts Engage with AR markers VRoommate : a constant VR livestream from a camera mounted on a small RC car that you can drive around to explore Collaboratively drive an RC car around the dev's living room Chat with other drivers Play with AR markers and buy treats for Gonzo Studio Broadcasts happen at 6 pm PST every day! VRoommate is 24/7, so come check out our live VR any time!
Meta Title: GonzoVR: Oct 1, 2018, GonzoVR and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on GonzoVR? Check out the release date (Oct 1, 2018), developer insights from GonzoVR, and a complete game summary.
